trans-unit.source: Describes a service where a XAML writer can use reported line information and then include the information in the output.
trans-unit.target: 描述的服务的 XAML 编写器可以使用报告的行信息，然后在输出中包含的信息。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter> implements IXamlLineInfoConsumer..NET Framework XAML Services and its XAML readers and XAML writers typically make line information available to callers, through debugging support in an IDE and through exceptions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter>实现 IXamlLineInfoConsumer...NET Framework XAML 服务和其 XAML 读取器和 XAML 编写器通常将行信息提供给调用方，通过调试在 IDE 中的支持和异常。</xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter>

trans-unit.source: Exactly how to consume line information is up to each consumer.
trans-unit.target: 如何使用行信息是最多每个使用者。

trans-unit.source: The line number to use in the output.
trans-unit.target: 要在输出中使用的行号。

trans-unit.source: The line position to use in the output.
trans-unit.target: 要在输出中使用的行位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether a line information service should provide values and therefore, should also call <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlLineInfoConsumer.SetLineInfo*> when relevant.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，确定是否应提供行信息服务值，并因此，还应调用<xref:System.Xaml.IXamlLineInfoConsumer.SetLineInfo*>时相关。</xref:System.Xaml.IXamlLineInfoConsumer.SetLineInfo*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if line information is used by the implementation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果使用的实现; 行信息否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
